Text: Are these trials or are they full versions?

Yea, I scanned entire folder with Avast and it came up clean.. then while trying to install a couple of them they came back as viruses.
Is it because their cracked or because they actually have viruses?
I honestly don't know. I would assume that if it was just because of them being cracked they would all get flagged.

AVG found viruses associated with these screensavers. I moved viruses to the vault and continued. The rest of the screensavers installed with no problems so far. I will keep you posted as long as my computer doesn't crash, my fingers are crossed.

So far so goodâŚeverything is running fine, hopefully it will stay that way. I am not sure if those above screensavers have viruses or were targeted for being cracked. If anything goes wrong I will do my best to spread the word.

Do not download: 1. It's in Russian, so you can't read options or instructions within the programs  2. It's Russian, and there are numerous warnings about dll hooks coming up in both AVG and Comodo.  Would you trust Russian software that's been cracked that has all these warnings?  Just asking.
